gg141094693zoo5793.hint: Oh, you think you can just turn the lights back on, eh? No chance! I've hidden all of the light patterns and you'll never find them. Well, except for this one. Not even your little DisCo ball badge can help you start the party now!

bb1945795921927403.hint: What's this? A note? "Thanks for visiting risk3sixty. Check out Armada, our advanced offensive security team. https://risk3sixty.com/learn-more-asm "

r419510094670zg31953570594.hint: What's this? A note? "Firmware bypasses EDR. We'll show you how, and reveal new BMC vulnerabilities. Read the Binarly Research https://www.binarly.io/blog/broken-trust-fixed-supermicro-bmc-bug-gains-a-new-life-in-two-new-vulnerabilities "

bb9510296737967945926934.hint: What's this? A note? "We're here for the hackers who build, break, and fix the future. Proud sponsors of the Hacker DisCo party."

oo579454194102964794.hint: What's this? A note? "You're in. Join elite hacker talent at https://Bugcrowd.com/hacker . Where life changing opportunity meets reward."

b1945zr1492zb94010zr41.hint: What's this? A note? "Secure at scale with humans + AI at Hackerone. Check us out at https://www.hackerone.com "

r51zb1945zr140795zb9414747.hint: What's this? A note? "Welcome to this DisCo edition, there's craft and passion for mission. But don't get it twisted, we know you've resisted. Talk to Interrupt Labs about a position. https://interruptlabs.teamtailor.com "

r7409649219241zb1941949215934.hint: What's this? A note? "Interested in innovation? Learn more about IQT's work in cyber and national security at https://www.iqt.org "

o59269454zb9401319593.hint: What's this? A note? "Greetings from the Applied Physics Laboratory, where a hacker can be a hacker: https://www.jhuapl.edu "

b951029640zo4956704.hint: What's this? A note? "Thank you for visiting Magnet Forensics. Interested in Digital Forensics/Graykey? We are HIRING: https://jobs.lever.co/magnetforensics "

gg941514129429479567.hint: What's this? A note? "The national intelligence community faces increasingly complex challengesâ€”but smarter solutions are here. https://nightwing.com "

g109647005zb793192192.hint: What's this? A note? "Thanks for visiting Two Six. Join Our Mission. Make An Impact. https://twosixtech.com/careers "

yy4795727943964700570.hint: What's this? A note? "Thanks for visiting Vigilant Labs. Reach out if you are looking for a new challenge in cutting-edge security research."

r74031zb1941935zg952095.hint: What's this? A note? "Thanks for visiting VulnCheck. Gain unmatched vulnerability visibility, prioritize response, and act before attacks strike." https://www.vulncheck.com

b951009459459364.hint: What's this? A note? "We're Zetier. We do vulnerability research. Sometimes on each other. Join us to sheep colleagues. https://bit.ly/zetier-disco "

bb194109570zgg9412475.hint: Bah, that one was easy. You're welcome. But don't think you can just walk around to all the other tables and turn the lights on that way!

rrr41zbbb94zggg1093zooo41zyyy94737.hint: Gah! I thought I left that booklet on the /metro. These laser colors are damaging my eyes. No matter, I'll hide my keys more carefully next time, there's no easy path here!

yyy79435704794zrrr373195.hint: Lights everywhere! That projector has even more light in it than all of those silly villages combined!

yyyy79459364794359395.hint: Bwahaha! "Light modeâ€, huh? What a joke, but fine, leave your tiny light on. Just don't get aheader yourself, I still hold a lot of the light!

r41zb94zg1295zo41zyyy9469295740.hint: That's it, I'm firing my laser guy.

o41493496zy94692705794zrrr37941924.hint: Stop following those lasers! I control the light, you'll never collect enough watts to start the party.

bb1941949649204957040.hint: So what, you found a few of my hiding places. But while you've been running around I've gotten into the DisCo website, it'll be mine soon!

rrzrzrzrzrzrzrzrzrrzrzrrzrzrrzrrzrr.hint: So you found another one of my codes, eh? No matter, I have many more! Although the logostics of keeping them all straight is getting tricky. Maybe I should hide some data inside some filesâ€¦

r7r4r1b70b940b1g94g10g4o5o4o3y94y7y4.hint: I hate the light, but I do love to dance! Too bad all those disco balls on the dance floor are like kryptonite, so many awful, shiny panels. Why can't all the panels be dark?!

rr41094102964zyy7954795729469254.hint: I basically _gave_ that one to you. Besides, that logo is too flashy, you can have it. I prefer simple text-based art.

ooo3964795792740795940704037.hint: You are really becoming a pin in my side! Why won't you just stop! Your resistance is futile, you know that, right? The lights will stay off forever!

y9474194zo39647094295zg94103793zb1941947.hint: Blast, I thought I hid that one really well. Fine, maybe you've got some hacking skills after all, but it's gonna take a village to solve all of my puzzles!

b94010293zzy7945793zzooo3570594310.hint: Your village friends may have helped you, but not enough! Wait, where was that last laser pointing? Nevermind, ignore that!

rrrr149274273109410294279414795479593594.hint: Blast! I thought my normal look would blend in with a bunch of hackers. I bet that little badge, Lumi, helped you, didn't she? Where did you even find her? Who would make such a thing?!

y795693zo5793zg9524747zb79396947zr74.hint: You found my map?! Gah! It's so dark on the subway / metro that I must have lost it. I was on that new line, the one with the terrible bright name.

r41zy479414zr2947041457zg396921.hint: So what, you found the logs. I donâ€™t care. The lights will never come on! Not even if you had all the money in the world! Wait, who is paying for all of this?? Wonder what they know...

r5319510296zy47941694293zg396924956941.hint: This is not going well. I might need to step in and stop you myself! Just need to make sure no one finds meâ€¦

o35705zb94952095.hint: Okay, this is getting ridiculous. Why can't you just quit! Maybe I need to try a different encoding scheme. I better jot this down in the logs.

rrzzrrrzrrzzrzzzrrr.hint: I love this song... but don't tell anyone. Can't remember who plays it, thoughâ€¦?

rzrrrzzr.hint: HOW DO YOU KEEP DOING THIS?!? Is this a game to you?? Waitâ€¦ is this a game? Am I in a game?!? Who made it??

rr710747zyy94714071947zbb940107041zgg941.hint: That's him! Lumi's creator. I'll deal with him later, but I think I'm drawing too much attention here at the DisCoâ€¦ I thought this outfit would blend right in with hackers!

gg944396295zrr71074170zo494594zbb9401209.hint: The DisCo CEO is unreasonable! She won't even keep the lights down just a little bit! No matter, her henchmen could still help me, like that game maker. I bet I could trade with him for some dimmingâ€¦

rr710747zyy479414zgg49401063zrr1407941zb.hint: So you found the game maker, eh? I tried to trade the name of the CEO with him to keep the lights off, but apparently he already knew the DisCo CEO. She's the one that's really trying to keep the lights on!
